conversation.message: We have your precious artifact. If you ever want to see it again, pay us $1 million.
Who are you? Why did you take it? How can I trust you'll return it if I pay?
We are a group of collectors. We took it because it belongs with us. You'll have to trust us.
Can you provide proof that you have the artifact?
We can send you a photo of a part of it. But first, the money.
